 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֶ֫גֶל‎</span><sub>247</sub> **noun feminine**<sup>[[Deut.8.4|Deut 8:4]]</sup> (on suffix masculine [[Song.5.3|Song 5:3]] see [[BDB#Kö|Kö]]<sup>Synt. § l4</sup> [[BDB#Albr.|Albr]]<sup>ZAW<sup>(xvi, 1896, 76) xv (1895), 316 f.</sup></sup>), ==foot== (Late Hebrew ***id.***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, ***leg, foot***; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎רַגְלָא‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***foot***; Palmyrene suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רגלה‎</span> [[BDB#Ldzb|Lzb]]<sup>368</sup>; transposed Zinjirli (plural construct) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לגרי‎</span> Id<sup>lb., Mandean</sup> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ליגרא‎</span> [[BDB#Nö|Nö]]<sup>M 102</sup>; compare Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***vehicle*** [[BDB#Di|Di]]<sup>347</sup>); — absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ר‎</span> [[Exod.21.24|Exod 21:24]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רָ֑גֶל‎</span> v[[Exod.21.24|Exod 21:24]] +; construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רֶגֶל‎</span> [[Num.22.25|Num 22:25]] +; suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רַגְלִי‎</span> [[Gen.30.30|Gen 30:30]] +, etc.; dual <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רַגְלָ֫יִם‎</span> [[1Sam.28.3|1Sam 28:3]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רַנְלָ֑יִם‎</span> [[2Sam.4.4|2Sam 4:4]] +; construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רַגְלֵי‎</span> [[Gen.24.32|Gen 24:32]] +; suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רַגְלַי‎</span> [[Num.20.19|Num 20:19]] +, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רַגְלֶיךָ‎</span> [[Exod.3.5|Exod 3:5]] +, etc.; plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רְגָלִים‎</span> [[Exod.23.14|Exod 23:14]] + 3 t. (see **2** below); — 

**1.** ***foot:*** 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** human, [[Gen.18.4|Gen 18:4]]; [[Gen.19.2|Gen 19:2]] + 10 t. of washing feet (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רחץ‎</span>); [[Exod.3.5|Exod 3:5]]; [[Exod.4.25|Exod 4:25]] + often; in figure [[Deut.32.35|Deut 32:35]]; [[1Sam.2.9|1Sam 2:9]]; [[Jer.2.25|Jer 2:25]]; [[Job.12.5|Job 12:5]] + often; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נַּאֲוָה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ר‎</span> [[Ps.36.12|Ps 36:12]] ***foot of pride***; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֲדֹם לְר‎</span> [[Ps.110.1|Ps 110:1]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כַּף ר‎</span> ***sole of foot*** [[Deut.2.5|Deut 2:5]]; [[Deut.11.24|Deut 11:24]]; [[Deut.28.56|Deut 28:56]]; [[Deut.28.65|Deut 28:65]] + 6 t., + <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִכַּף ר‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְעַד ראֹשׁ‎</span> [[Isa.1.6|Isa 1:6]], compare (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וְעַד קדקד‎</span>) [[2Sam.14.25|2Sam 14:25]]; [[Deut.28.35|Deut 28:35]]; [[Job.2.7|Job 2:7]] also <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵראֹשׁ וְעַד ר‎</span> [[Lev.13.12|Lev 13:12]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁרְשֵׁי ר‎</span> [[Job.13.27|Job 13:27]] see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֹׁרֶשׁ‎</span>;<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶצְבְּעוֺת ר‎</span> [[2Sam.21.20|2Sam 21:20]] = ***toes***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בֹּהֶן ר‎</span> = ***great toe*** [[Judg.1.6|Judg 1:6]]; [[Judg.1.7|Judg 1:7]]; [[Exod.29.20|Exod 29:20]] + 6 t. Leviticus; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ר‎</span> = ***leg*** [[1Sam.17.6|1Sam 17:6]] (see also **feminine** ***near the end***). 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** anthropomorphism of God, [[Exod.24.10|Exod 24:10]]; [[2Sam.22.10|2Sam 22:10]] = [[Ps.18.10|Ps 18:10]]; [[Nah.1.3|Nah 1:3]]; [[Hab.3.5|Hab 3:5]]; [[Isa.60.13|Isa 60:13]]; [[Zech.14.4|Zech 14:4]]<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כַּפּוֺת ר‎</span> [[Ezek.43.7|Ezek 43:7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֲדֹם ר‎</span> [[Isa.66.1|Isa 66:1]]; [[Lam.2.1|Lam 2:1]]; [[1Chr.28.2|1Chr 28:2]]; [[Ps.99.5|Ps 99:5]]; [[Ps.132.7|Ps 132:7]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **c.** of seraphim [[Isa.6.2|Isa 6:2]], Ezekiel's <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חַיּוֺת‎</span> [[Ezek.1.7|Ezek 1:7]] (twice in verse) and (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כֵּף ר‎</span>) v[[Ezek.1.7|Ezek 1:7]], cherubim [[2Chr.3.13|2Chr 3:13]] idols [[Ps.115.7|Ps 115:7]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **d.** of animals: dove,<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כַּף ר‎</span> [[Gen.8.9|Gen 8:9]] ([[BDB#J|J]]); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֶׁרֶץ עוֺף‎</span> [[Lev.11.21|Lev 11:21]]; [[Lev.11.23|Lev 11:23]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֶׁרֶץ‎</span> v[[Lev.11.42|Lev 11:42]] calf, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כַּף ר‎</span> [[Ezek.1.7|Ezek 1:7]] (in simile), <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּהֵמָה‎</span> [[Ezek.29.11|Ezek 29:11]] Pharaoh under figure of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תַּנִּים‎</span> [[Ezek.32.2|Ezek 32:2]] probably of beast also [[Job.39.15|Job 39:15]], indefinite [[Isa.28.3|Isa 28:3]] (in figurative). 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **e.** of table [[Exod.25.26|Exod 25:26]]; [[Exod.37.13|Exod 37:13]] ([[BDB#P|P]]). **feminine** ==phrases:== <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְר‎</span> (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span>) **5 i** ***according to the pace of*** [[Gen.33.14|Gen 33:14]] (twice in verse) ([[BDB#J|J]]; as fast as cattle, children, can go); ***at one's guidance*** [[Deut.33.8|Deut 33:8]] ***at one's foot***, i.e. at every step [[Gen.30.30|Gen 30:30]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Isa.41.2|Isa 41:2]], compare [[Job.18.11|Job 18:11]] (see I. [ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פּוּץ‎</span>] **Hiph\`il**); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הלך לְר‎</span> [[1Sam.25.42|1Sam 25:42]], i.e. went where she went, compare [[2Sam.15.16|2Sam 15:16]]; [[2Sam.15.17|2Sam 15:17]]; [[2Sam.15.18|2Sam 15:18]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּר‎</span> ***on*** one's ***feet***, on foot, [[Num.20.19|Num 20:19]] ([[BDB#J|J]][[BDB#E|E]]), [[Deut.2.28|Deut 2:28]]; [[Judg.4.15|Judg 4:15]]; [[Judg.4.17|Judg 4:17]]; [[Ps.66.6|Ps 66:6]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֻׁלֵּח בְּר‎</span> [[Judg.5.15|Judg 5:15]] (see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁלח‎</span>), compare [[Job.18.8|Job 18:8]] (and <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎רַגְלַי שִׁלֵּח֑וּ‎</span> [[Job.30.12|Job 30:12]]); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַבְּהֵמָה) אֲשֶׁר בְּד‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַיְקוּם‎</span>, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎(הָעָם‎</span>, i.e. which follow one, hence obey or belong to one, [[Exod.11.8|Exod 11:8]] ([[BDB#J|J]]), [[Judg.4.10|Judg 4:10]]; [[Judg.8.5|Judg 8:5]]; [[1Kgs.20.10|1Kgs 20:10]]; [[Deut.11.6|Deut 11:6]]; [[2Kgs.3.9|2Kgs 3:9]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַמִּתְהַלְּכִים בְּר‎</span> [[1Sam.25.27|1Sam 25:27]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָשָׂא ר‎</span> [[Gen.29.1|Gen 29:1]] ([[BDB#E|E]]) = set out, but <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָרִים אֶתרֿ‎</span> [[Gen.41.44|Gen 41:44]] ([[BDB#E|E]]) ***lift the foot***, i.e. make a movement, do anything; euphemism <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵסִיךְ אֶתרֿ‎</span> [[Judg.3.24|Judg 3:24]], compare [[1Sam.24.3|1Sam 24:3]] ([[BDB#Gi|Gi]]; [[BDB#van d.H.|van d. H.]] [[BDB#Baer|Baer]] v.[[1Sam.24.4|1Sam 24:4]] see I. [ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎סָכַךְ‎</span>] **Hiph\`il**); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתְּפַשְּׂקִי אֶתרֿ‎</span> [[Ezek.16.25|Ezek 16:25]] (see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פשׂק‎</span>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַיּוֺצֵת מִבֵּין ר‎</span> [[Deut.28.57|Deut 28:57]] (see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יצא‎</span> **1 h**); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מֵימֵי ר‎</span> [[BDB#Qr|Qr]] [[2Kgs.18.27|2Kgs 18:27]] = [[Isa.36.12|Isa 36:12]] ([[BDB#Kt|Kt]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שיניהם‎</span>; see <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַיִם‎</span> **3**); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׂעַר‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָר‎</span> [[Isa.7.20|Isa 7:20]], i.e. hair of the private parts. 

**2.** plural only in phrase <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁלשׁ רְגָלִים‎</span> ***three times*** (feet, paces, compare <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פַּעַם‎</span>) [[Exod.23.14|Exod 23:14]] ([[BDB#E|E]]), [[Num.22.28|Num 22:28]]; [[Num.22.32|Num 22:32]]; [[Num.22.33|Num 22:33]] ([[BDB#J|J]]).
